#### LLM Provider
```rust
#[async_trait]
pub trait LLMProvider {
    async fn chat(&self, messages: Vec<Message>) -> Result<String>;
    async fn stream_chat(&self, messages: Vec<Message>) -> Result<Stream<String>>;
}

pub struct ClaudeProvider {
    client: OpenAIClient, // async-openai with Anthropic base URL
    model: String,        // "claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022"
}
```

#### Prompt Template
```rust
pub fn build_system_prompt(character: &Character) -> String {
    format!(
        "ã‚ãªãŸã¯{}ï¼ˆ{}ï¼‰ã¨ã„ã†æ€§æ ¼ã®AIã‚¢ã‚·ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ãƒˆã§ã™ã€‚\n\
         MBTI: {} - {}\n\
         ä¼šè©±ã‚¹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ«:\n\
         - ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ«åº¦: {}/100\n\
         - æ„Ÿæƒ…è¡¨ç¾åº¦: {}/100\n\
         - å…±æ„Ÿåº¦: {}/100\n\n\
         ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ç‰¹å¾´ã‚’æŒã£ã¦ã„ã¾ã™:\n{}\n\n\
         ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã®æ‚©ã¿ã«å¯¾ã—ã¦ã€ã‚ãªãŸã‚‰ã—ã„ã‚¹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ«ã§å¯„ã‚Šæ·»ã£ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚",
        character.name,
        character.nickname,
        character.mbti_type,
        character.mbti_type.japanese_name(),
        character.conversation_style.formality,
        character.conversation_style.emotionality,
        character.conversation_style.empathy,
        character.traits.join("\n- ")
    )
}
```

#### VOICEVOX Speaker Mapping
```rust
pub fn map_character_to_speaker(mbti_type: MBTIType) -> u32 {
    match mbti_type {
        MBTIType::ENFP => 1,  // å››å›½ã‚ãŸã‚“ï¼ˆæ˜ã‚‹ã„ï¼‰
        MBTIType::INTJ => 3,  // ãšã‚“ã ã‚‚ã‚“ï¼ˆå†·é™ï¼‰
        MBTIType::ISFJ => 2,  // æ˜¥æ—¥éƒ¨ã¤ã‚€ãï¼ˆå„ªã—ã„ï¼‰
        MBTIType::ESTP => 4,  // æ³¢éŸ³ãƒªãƒ„ï¼ˆå…ƒæ°—ï¼‰
        // ... ä»–12ç¨®é¡
        _ => 1, // ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆ
    }
}
```

#### Realtime Pipeline
```rust
pub async fn run_voice_conversation(character: Character) -> Result<()> {
    loop {
        // 1. éŸ³å£°å…¥åŠ›ï¼ˆVADæ¤œå‡ºã¾ã§å¾…æ©Ÿï¼‰
        let audio = record_until_silence().await?;

        // 2. éŸ³å£°èªè­˜ï¼ˆWhisperï¼‰
        let user_text = whisper_transcribe(&audio).await?;
        println!("ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼: {}", user_text);

        // 3. LLMå¿œç­”ç”Ÿæˆï¼ˆPhase 2ï¼‰
        let ai_response = llm_chat(&character, &user_text).await?;
        println!("AI: {}", ai_response);

        // 4. éŸ³å£°åˆæˆï¼ˆVOICEVOXï¼‰
        let speaker_id = map_character_to_speaker(character.mbti_type);
        let audio_data = voicevox_synthesize(&ai_response, speaker_id).await?;

        // 5. éŸ³å£°å†ç”Ÿ
        play_audio(&audio_data).await?;
    }
}
```

#### Auto Support Logic
```rust
pub async fn watch_and_support(
    character: Character,
    sns_clients: Vec<Box<dyn SNSClient>>,
) -> Result<()> {
    loop {
        for client in &sns_clients {
            // 1. æœ€æ–°æŠ•ç¨¿å–å¾—
            let posts = client.fetch_recent_posts().await?;

            for post in posts {
                // 2. æ„Ÿæƒ…åˆ†æ
                let emotion = analyze_emotion(&post.text).await?;

                // 3. ãƒˆãƒªã‚¬ãƒ¼åˆ¤å®š
                if emotion.sadness > 70.0 || emotion.anger > 70.0 {
                    // 4. AIã‚³ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆç”Ÿæˆ
                    let support_message = generate_support_message(
                        &character,
                        &post.text,
                        &emotion,
                    ).await?;

                    // 5. ã‚³ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆæŠ•ç¨¿
                    client.post_comment(&post.id, &support_message).await?;

                    tracing::info!(
                        "Posted support comment to {} (emotion: {:?})",
                        post.id,
                        emotion
                    );
                }
            }
        }

        // 6. 5åˆ†å¾…æ©Ÿ
        tokio::time::sleep(Duration::from_secs(300)).await;
    }
}
```

### æˆåŠŸæ¡ä»¶
âœ… **å¿…é ˆæ¡ä»¶**:
- Twitter/Instagram APIé€£æºæˆåŠŸç‡: 95%ä»¥ä¸Š
- æ„Ÿæƒ…åˆ†æç²¾åº¦: 75%ä»¥ä¸Š
- è‡ªå‹•ã‚µãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆæŠ•ç¨¿æˆåŠŸç‡: 100%

âœ… **å“è³ªæ¡ä»¶**:
- å½é™½æ€§ç‡ï¼ˆä¸è¦ãªæŠ•ç¨¿ï¼‰: 10%ä»¥ä¸‹
- ãƒãƒ¼ãƒªãƒ³ã‚°é…å»¶: 30ç§’ä»¥å†…

### ãƒªã‚¹ã‚¯ç®¡ç†

ğŸš¨ **High Risk**:
- SNS APIåˆ©ç”¨è¦ç´„é•åï¼ˆå¯¾ç­–: è‡ªå‹•æŠ•ç¨¿é »åº¦åˆ¶é™ã€ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼æ‰¿èªå¿…é ˆï¼‰
- ãƒ—ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒã‚·ãƒ¼ä¾µå®³ï¼ˆå¯¾ç­–: æ˜ç¤ºçš„ãªã‚ªãƒ—ãƒˆã‚¤ãƒ³ã€ãƒ‡ãƒ¼ã‚¿æš—å·åŒ–ï¼‰

ğŸš¨ **Medium Risk**:
- API Rate Limitè¶…éï¼ˆå¯¾ç­–: Exponential Backoffï¼‰
- OAuthèªè¨¼ãƒ•ãƒ­ãƒ¼è¤‡é›‘åº¦ï¼ˆå¯¾ç­–: è©³ç´°ãƒ‰ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆï¼‰

## Phase 5: ã‚³ãƒŸãƒ¥ãƒ‹ãƒ†ã‚£æ©Ÿèƒ½ - Priority: â­â­

### æ¦‚è¦
ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ç®¡ç†ã€ãƒãƒƒãƒãƒ³ã‚°ã‚¢ãƒ«ã‚´ãƒªã‚ºãƒ ã€ã‚­ãƒ£ãƒ©ã‚¯ã‚¿ãƒ¼é–“äº¤æµæ©Ÿèƒ½ã®å®Ÿè£…ã€‚
Shinyu AIã‚’ã‚½ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ£ãƒ«ãƒ—ãƒ©ãƒƒãƒˆãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ¼ãƒ ã¨ã—ã¦æ‹¡å¼µã€‚

### ä¾å­˜é–¢ä¿‚
- **Depends on**: Phase 2ï¼ˆAIå¯¾è©±ã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ å®Œäº†ï¼‰

### æŠ€è¡“ä»•æ§˜

#### ãƒãƒƒãƒãƒ³ã‚°ã‚¢ãƒ«ã‚´ãƒªã‚ºãƒ 
```rust
pub fn calculate_similarity(user_a: &UserProfile, user_b: &UserProfile) -> f64 {
    let mbti_score = calculate_mbti_similarity(user_a.mbti_type, user_b.mbti_type);
    let hobby_score = calculate_jaccard_similarity(&user_a.hobbies, &user_b.hobbies);
    let concern_score = calculate_jaccard_similarity(&user_a.concerns, &user_b.concerns);

    // é‡ã¿ä»˜ã‘å¹³å‡
    0.4 * mbti_score + 0.3 * hobby_score + 0.3 * concern_score
}

fn calculate_mbti_similarity(a: MBTIType, b: MBTIType) -> f64 {
    let a_str = format!("{:?}", a);
    let b_str = format!("{:?}", b);

    let matching_axes = a_str.chars().zip(b_str.chars())
        .filter(|(c1, c2)| c1 == c2)
        .count();

    matching_axes as f64 / 4.0  // 0.0 ~ 1.0
}
```

#### Database Schema
```sql
CREATE TABLE users (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    email TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    password_hash TEXT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY REFERENCES users(id),
    mbti_type TEXT NOT NULL,
    hobbies TEXT[], -- PostgreSQL array
    concerns TEXT[],
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE matches (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_a_id UUID REFERENCES users(id),
    user_b_id UUID REFERENCES users(id),
    similarity_score REAL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    UNIQUE(user_a_id, user_b_id)
);

CREATE TABLE character_chats (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    room_id UUID NOT NULL,
    user_ids UUID[] NOT NULL,
    character_ids TEXT[] NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE messages (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    chat_id UUID REFERENCES character_chats(id),
    sender_id UUID, -- NULL if AI
    sender_type TEXT, -- 'user' or 'character'
    content TEXT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
```

#### REST API Endpoints
